trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to the tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when it matches a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Contém os dados enviados ao serviço de acompanhamento pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução quando há correspondência com um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: It is also used in the return list of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Ela também é usada na lista de retorno da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents" />.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Quando a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução corresponde um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> em uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, envia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> para o serviço de controle sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associada ao controle de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The tracking service can perform whatever action is necessary on the data in the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de acompanhamento pode executar qualquer ação é necessária nos dados no registro de controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: O construtor é chamado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates the date and time of the workflow status event associated with the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que indica a data e a hora do evento de status de fluxo de trabalho associado ao registro de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: The relative order in which the workflow status event associated with this tracking record occurred in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A ordem relativa em que o evento de status de fluxo de trabalho associado a este registro de acompanhamento ocorreu na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Either a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs" />, a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs" />, a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs" />, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs" />, um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs" />, um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs" /> ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" /> value, <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />, number, and <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord" /> usando o valor <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" />, o número <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> e o <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: `eventDateTime` is expressed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: `eventDateTime` é expresso em tempo Universal Coordenado (UTC).

trans-unit.source: `eventOrder` is guaranteed to be unique within the workflow instance; however, it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
trans-unit.target: `eventOrder` é garantido para ser exclusivo dentro da instância de fluxo de trabalho; No entanto, não é garantido para ser sequenciais.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" /> that was matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" /> correspondido.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> that contains the annotations that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> que contém as anotações que estão associadas a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains additional data associated with certain types of workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados adicionais associados a determinados tipos de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Either a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs" />, a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs" />, a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs" />, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs" />, um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs" />, um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs" /> ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: For most workflow status events, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing`); however, for certain kinds of workflow status events the runtime tracking infrastructure uses <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to return additional data about the workflow status event.
trans-unit.target: Para a maioria dos eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> é uma referência nula (`Nothing`); no entanto, para determinados tipos de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho usa o infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> para retornar dados adicionais sobre o evento de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that correspond to these special workflow status events and the type of object returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> for each of these workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: A seguinte tabela lista o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> valores que correspondem a esses eventos de status especial do fluxo de trabalho e o tipo de objeto retornado no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> para cada um desses eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> Value
trans-unit.target: Valor <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> Object
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> Objeto

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time that the workflow tracking event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e hora em que ocorreu o evento de acompanhamento de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates the date and time that the workflow status event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que indica a data e hora em que ocorreu o evento de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime> é o tempo Universal Coordenado (UTC).

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in the workflow instance of the workflow status event that matched the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordem na instância de fluxo de trabalho do evento de status da atividade que correspondeu ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order of the workflow status event in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a ordem do evento de status do fluxo de trabalho na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> indicates the relative order in the workflow instance of the workflow status event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> indica a ordem relativa em que a instância de fluxo de trabalho do evento de status do fluxo de trabalho que correspondem a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> é exclusivo dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas não é garantido para ser sequenciais.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of workflow status event associated with the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de evento de status do fluxo de trabalho associado ao registro de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent" />.

trans-unit.source: `TrackingWorkflowEvent` contains one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values indicating the kind of workflow status event that was matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure and caused the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to be sent.
trans-unit.target: `TrackingWorkflowEvent` contém uma da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> valores indicando o tipo de evento de status do fluxo de trabalho que foi correspondido pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução e fez o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> para serem enviadas.

trans-unit.source: It reflects the current status of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Ele reflete o status atual da instância do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance emits workflow status events only when the status of the workflow instance changes, and, therefore, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can be matched only when a workflow status change occurs.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho somente quando o status da instância do fluxo de trabalho é alterado e, portanto, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> pode ser correspondido somente quando ocorre uma alteração de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.
